trans-unit.source: Provides an abstract class for controls that allow multiple items to be selected.
trans-unit.target: 为允许选择多项的控件提供抽象类。

trans-unit.source: When you derive a class from the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector> class, set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.CanSelectMultipleItems%2A> property to `true` to allow multi-selection in your control.
trans-unit.target: 当你从派生类<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector>类中，设置<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.CanSelectMultipleItems%2A>属性`true`以允许多重选择控件中。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector> is an abstract class and cannot be instantiated directly.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector> 是一个抽象类，不能直接实例化。

trans-unit.source: Starts a new selection transaction.
trans-unit.target: 启动新的选择事务。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.BeginUpdateSelectedItems%2A> method sets <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.IsUpdatingSelectedItems%2A> to `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.BeginUpdateSelectedItems%2A>方法设置<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.IsUpdatingSelectedItems%2A>到`true`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.EndUpdateSelectedItems%2A> method sets <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.IsUpdatingSelectedItems%2A> to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.EndUpdateSelectedItems%2A>方法设置<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.IsUpdatingSelectedItems%2A>到`false`。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.BeginUpdateSelectedItems%2A> method in a class derived from <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.BeginUpdateSelectedItems%2A>从派生类中的方法<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector>。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.IsUpdatingSelectedItems" /> is <see langword="true" /> when this method is called.
trans-unit.target: 在调用此方法时，<see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.IsUpdatingSelectedItems" /> 为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the multiple items in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector" /> can be selected at a time.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否可以一次选择 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector" /> 中的多个项。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if multiple items in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector" /> can be selected at a time; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果可以一次选择 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector" /> 中的多个项，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.CanSelectMultipleItems%2A> property to `true` in a derived class to allow multi-selection for that class.
trans-unit.target: 设置<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.CanSelectMultipleItems%2A>属性`true`派生的类，以允许多重选择为该类中。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to set this property in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何在派生类中设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: Commits the selected items to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector" />.
trans-unit.target: 将所选项提交到 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector" />。

trans-unit.source: This method sets <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.IsUpdatingSelectedItems%2A> to `false` and updates the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.SelectedItems%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 此方法会设置<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.IsUpdatingSelectedItems%2A>到`false`并更新<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.SelectedItems%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.BeginUpdateSelectedItems%2A> method sets <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.IsUpdatingSelectedItems%2A> to `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.BeginUpdateSelectedItems%2A>方法设置<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.IsUpdatingSelectedItems%2A>到`true`。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.EndUpdateSelectedItems%2A> method in a class derived from <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.EndUpdateSelectedItems%2A>从派生类中的方法<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector>。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.IsUpdatingSelectedItems" /> is <see langword="false" /> when this method is called.
trans-unit.target: 在调用此方法时，<see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.IsUpdatingSelectedItems" /> 为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector" /> is currently performing a bulk update to the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.SelectedItems" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector" /> 当前是否正在对 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.SelectedItems" /> 集合执行批量更新。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector" /> is currently performing a bulk update to the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.SelectedItems" /> collection; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector" /> 当前正在对 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.SelectedItems" /> 集合执行批量更新，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.BeginUpdateSelectedItems%2A> method sets <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.IsUpdatingSelectedItems%2A> to `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.BeginUpdateSelectedItems%2A>方法设置<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.IsUpdatingSelectedItems%2A>到`true`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.EndUpdateSelectedItems%2A> method sets <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.IsUpdatingSelectedItems%2A> to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.EndUpdateSelectedItems%2A>方法设置<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.IsUpdatingSelectedItems%2A>到`false`。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.IsUpdatingSelectedItems%2A> property in a class derived from <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.IsUpdatingSelectedItems%2A>属性类中的派生自<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector>。

trans-unit.source: Selects all of the items in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector" />.
trans-unit.target: 选择 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector" /> 中的所有项。

trans-unit.source: You can use this method only if <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.CanSelectMultipleItems%2A> is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用此方法才<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.CanSelectMultipleItems%2A>是`true`。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.CanSelectMultipleItems" /> is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.CanSelectMultipleItems" /> 为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the items in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector" /> that are selected.
trans-unit.target: 获取在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector" /> 中选定的项。

trans-unit.source: The items in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector" /> that are selected.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector" /> 中选定的项。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.CanSelectMultipleItems%2A> is `false`, you cannot add more than one item to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.SelectedItems%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.CanSelectMultipleItems%2A>是`false`，不能添加到多个项<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.SelectedItems%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: Attempts to do so will cause an exception.
trans-unit.target: 尝试这样做将导致异常。

trans-unit.source: Unselects all of the items in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector" />.
trans-unit.target: 取消选择 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector" /> 中的所有项。

trans-unit.source: You can use this method regardless of whether <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.CanSelectMultipleItems%2A> is `true` or `false`.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用此方法，而不管是否<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.CanSelectMultipleItems%2A>是`true`或`false`。
